attributes.action: Introduce legislation to enable local councils to be funded from general taxation, there abolishing council tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If councils were funded from general taxation then council tax could be abolished and peoples' contribution would be based on ability to pay.  When people are paying for services supplied by local councils, what has this got to do with their property values.  the present system is inequitable and ridiculous.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
